title: California to Trump: Keep ICE out of our courthouses
text: "Enforcement policies that include stalking courthouses and arresting undocumented immigrants, the vast majority of whom pose no risk to public safety, are neither safe nor fair," wrote Cantil-Sakauye, who was appointed by former Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger and is considered one of the more conservative justices on the state's high court.
summary:
"Enforcement policies that include stalking courthouses and arresting undocumented immigrants, the vast majority of whom pose no risk to public safety, are neither safe nor fair," wrote Cantil-Sakauye, who was appointed by former Gov.
Arnold Schwarzenegger and is considered one of the more conservative justices on the state's high court.
